thread.title: The 50 Most Epic Street Style Coats of All Time
thread.title_full: The 50 Most Epic Street Style Coats of All Time

author: Emily Farra
title: The 50 Most Epic Street Style Coats of All Time
text:
View slideshow 
Once January rolls around, you might feel a false sense of hope that we’re halfway through winter. But don’t be fooled—things are going to look (and feel) quite gray for a few more months. (Remember how it was 72 degrees last Christmas, then 1 degree below zero on Valentine’s Day ?) Getting to the gym on a frozen morning is hard enough, but try hitting the pavement in New York, London, Milan, and Paris for 30 days straight of fashion shows. Consider this your friendly reminder that New York Fashion Week kicks off in just over a month! 
By then, we’ll likely abandon any semblance of an “outfit” in favor of giant scarves, oversize sweaters, and boots. But here’s a pro tip: You can still pull off a good look with an incredible fur (or faux fur!) coat. From rainbow stripes to fuzzy neutrals, a statement-making coat packs a serious punch but keeps you seriously warm, too. It’s been a winter wardrobe MVP for seasons now, but trust us when we say this trend isn’t going anywhere. Get inspired by 50 of our all-time favorites in the slideshow above—when the first polar vortex hits, all you’ll need is a great pair of jeans and a few dozen hand warmers.
